page.title: 16Our Farm Visit No.2.
page.content: On Thursday 16th. May 1985 Derek Mackenzie and I went to{Kirkton Farm to ask some questions about what the farmer grew in his fields and what kind of farm animals he had.We were like the commisioners who collected similar information in 1086 for William the Conqueror. Mr.Lindsay,the farmer answered all our questions.See Derek's account no.10. We recorded his answers on to a {tape recorder. After we had finished the interview Mrs.Lindsay gave us each a can of Fanta.Derek comes from the {Hebrides}and Mr.Lindsay knew the area because his grandfather,father and he himself went fishing every year to a loch very near to where Derek was born.He showed us a stone from the loch;a souvenier of a good day's {fishing.}Dean Stirton primary 6.
